name: 猫咪公寓
description:
Support English, bilingual subtitles!!

The STORY:.
Spring Festival door shovel shit official
"I am a stranger in a foreign land, and I miss my loved ones more than ever on festivals."
The Spring Festival is approaching, and you are working in the big city, but you can't go home.
So you choose to be a Chinese New Year door-to-door pooper in charge of an apartment full of cats.
Find the cats, not one less!!

How To Play The Game:
2.5D, rotatable, hunt game, dynamic cat hunt game


Features:
· 2.5D minimalist style
· Rotatable viewing Angle
· Dynamic cat
· 6 floors
· Hundreds of cats
· Explore apartments, Loft
· Drag and zoom the screen
· Relax and find all the cats

Thanks for the technical support of our cat "Huahua"!!
